description: These 30 Minute Sweet Potato and Zucchini Tostadas are so easy to make! Â They're also loaded with veggies so they're healthy too!
keywords: 30 Minute, Dinner, Tostadas, Sweet Potato, Zucchini, Gluten Free
name: 30-Minute Sweet Potato and Zucchini Tostadas
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups refried beans, I like to use black
3/4 cup grated cheese, vegan cheese if necessary
Your favorite toppings: avocado, onion, lettuce, tomato, cilantro, salsa, etc.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and add olive oil and grated sweet potato. Cook for about 2 minutes and then add grated zucchini, salt, pepper and spices. Stir together and cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Lay tostada shells on a large baking sheet and spread each with about 1/4 cup refried beans, 1/6 of the veggie mixture and top with 2 tablespoons shredded cheese.
Bake tostadas until heated through and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
Add your favorite toppings and enjoy!
